name: Van Winkle + Associates
description:
Van Winkle + Associates is a full service marketing and advertising agency headquartered in Atlanta, GA.  Founded in 1984, VWA delivers on the original promise to give clients more bang for their buck by providing strategic marketing solutions in an innovative way.  This philosophy has allowed the firm to grow from a regional strategic marketing agency into one of the most creative and successful marketing and advertising agencies in the Southeast.
Clients come to VWA because they want senior level talent to work on their business everyday.  With Alex Van Winkle at the helm, clients are assured that their account will get the attention and expertise needed to move from a "challenger brand" into a "break out" brand for their category. Our culture is one of the underdog.  We embrace our flexibility and nimbleness (if that's even a word) and use it to our client's advantage. At VWA our goal each and everyday is to find new and innovative ways to make every marketing dollar work that much harder, by creating work that's smarter. Because at the end of the day, our goal is not to outspend the competition. It's to outsmart them.
